content.question: Candidates for political office use public opinion polls for all of the following purposes EXCEPT to

choices.label: assess recognition of the candidate’s name
measure voters’ support for the candidate’s issues
bring the opposition’s opinions into alignment with those of the candidate
identify key issues among the voters

content.answer: bring the opposition’s opinions into alignment with those of the candidate

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
